function renderLine( line, pattern) for i=1, strlen(pattern) do local c = strsub( pattern, i, i) if c =="#" then set_stone( "st-greenbrown", i-1, line) elseif c == "o" then oxyd( i-1, line) elseif c == "!" then fill_floor("fl-water", i-1,line, 1,1) elseif c=="d" then oneway(i-1,line, enigma.SOUTH) elseif c=="z" then set_actor("ac-blackball", i-.5,line+.5) elseif c=="+" then set_stone( "st-wood", i-1, line) elseif c=="*" then set_stone( "st-wood", i-1, line) fill_floor("fl-water", i-1,line, 1,1) end end end
-- Floor: " " -- Border: "#" -- Oxyd: "o"
